technicalEvent.title: Solution Sprint:
technicalEvent.subtitle: (Technical Event)
technicalEvent.description: The Solution Sprint involves presenting a solution to a problem statement, They have the freedom to select any problem statement and devise a solution for it

nonTechnicalEvent.title: Talent Fest:
nonTechnicalEvent.subtitle: (Non Technical Event)
nonTechnicalEvent.description: In Talent Fest, Participants need to exhibit their skills and abilities in a particular category (Categories are listed below)

technicalEvent.title: Cyber Siege:
technicalEvent.subtitle: (Technical Event)
technicalEvent.description: Cyber Siege is a Capture The Flag event that contains 10 challenges in the category of Web, Crypto, Reversing, Forensics & OSINT

nonTechnicalEvent.title: Reel Tunes:
nonTechnicalEvent.subtitle: (Non Technical Event)
nonTechnicalEvent.description: Reel Tunes contains 3 rounds, 1) Guess the BGM, 2) Find the movie name with the given images, 3) Find the missing lyrics in the song.

technicalEvent.title: Debug Drift:
technicalEvent.subtitle: (Technical Event)
technicalEvent.description: Debug Drift is code debugging event that contains few programming challenges

nonTechnicalEvent.title: IPL Blitz:
nonTechnicalEvent.subtitle: (Non Technical Event)
nonTechnicalEvent.description: IPL Blitz contains 2 or 3 rounds, In the first two rounds participants need to answer the questions thats related to IPL., In the Final round they are sorted out to 4 individual teams for the IPL Auction

technicalEvent.title: Markup Mayhem:
technicalEvent.subtitle: (Technical Event)
technicalEvent.description: Markup Mayhem is an HTML & CSS battle event, Participants need to style the given web page design accurately using HTML & CSS. All assets and Figma design needed for Web Page design will be provided on spot. No team participation. Participants should design within the allotted time 01:45pm to 02:45pm. Participants shall bring their own laptops for their convenience.

nonTechnicalEvent.title: Fast n Frolic
nonTechnicalEvent.subtitle: (Non Technical Event)
nonTechnicalEvent.description: Fast n Frolic is an adventure-themed event that involves several fun games that require physical activity
